website_summaries.verdict: The follow-up to Flappy Bird, Swing Copters is a maddeningly difficult game in a simple, free package.

customer_reviews.title: don't get hooked
customer_reviews.text: This game is repetitive and should be boring but it's not. It is however frustrating, I am on level 14 and can't get any further every time I get to 12,13 or 14 a little bit of excitement creeps in and my flying copter bird thingy lurches out of control and smashes into something. This game reminds me of old spectrum games that where simple but very addictive and annoying
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so bad!!! My friend told me about it but now I've got it I've realised there's no point. It is impossible to control which way you go. When you tap on the left for example the helicopter just stays where it is and then crashes!!! You can't control it. I won't be recommending this game to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr

customer_reviews.title: challenge
customer_reviews.text: This is my 11 year old son's review: Swing copters is a challenging but fun game and my highest score is 4 try beat that so please make more games like this one good luck with beating my high score you'll need it
customer_reviews.author: VickyP

customer_reviews.title: A good challenge
customer_reviews.text: It is hard but it isn't impossible. Just have to spend some time getting used to the controls and be a Zen MF. Try using both thumbs and looking at the next gap rather than your bird guy. Level 20 gets you the bronze medal.
customer_reviews.author: JackJackdaw

customer_reviews.title: ahhhh!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 6 months ago if someone came to me and said that there was a game that was harder than flappy birds I woulda slapped them, and now there's this. This game is killing me inside :( I wish they brought back flappy birds instead of this
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J McLennan

After flappy bird I thought that u had learned your lesson that people want u to stop being an area. Done someone u don't know xxx

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sorry - can't review - it was a present for a relative
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mikey B

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This game is one of the worst I've played. The guy goes to the right so quickly it's impossible to play. I couldn't even get one it was so hard. So here's a tip about this game. DON'T GET IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: K Lafavre

customer_reviews.title: don't download
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst games I have ever played it is way to hard and is even more annoying than flappy bird, it makes me so angry just don't download it
customer_reviews.author: skyemarshall

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the most annoying game ever. Not addictive just plain annoying
customer_reviews.author: jules Ham

customer_reviews.title: addictive
customer_reviews.text: The thing is flappy bird is better but this is very addicting.
customer_reviews.author: James Stringer

customer_reviews.title: good vut not great and very hard
customer_reviews.text: I like this game but it is soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo hard I can't get past 5 .I don't recommend it for people who hate challenges
customer_reviews.author: graham tickle

customer_reviews.title: *sigh*
customer_reviews.text: You already know how awful this game is before you even download it, way too hard to be the slightest bit enjoyable and boring to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: swing copters
customer_reviews.text: Great little game. Very hard, but once you get the hang of it it's not so impossible! It's free get it!!!
customer_reviews.author: andrew milbank

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: The game is brilliant. Very addictive. My high score so far is 22. I like how when you get to 20 points you get to toggle between unlocked characters.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Williams

customer_reviews.title: cool ,herd
customer_reviews.text: It is hard but very awesome. You can get hooked
customer_reviews.author: Nina Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: OMG so hard not fun one bit
customer_reviews.text: OMG my high score is one I tried lots of times and zero it is sooooooooooo annoying bad game not worth downloading :(
customer_reviews.author: Cool game

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: Seems like I played this game before. We need a new concept.
customer_reviews.author: Krysal

customer_reviews.title: rubbish
customer_reviews.text: It's a good game and I like the idea but I swear that whenever you turn the character it's delayed
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: not fun
customer_reviews.text: waste of time,not fun at all,that's all you can say,so I will just jib a jab to fill in 20 words just for amazon,but all in all the game is SH.T and it dose not deserve 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Mr smith

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This game is alright but it gets very boring after a while. The main problem is that it's extremely hard. Try getting past 3. Good thing that it's free, because I would have been getting a refund asap.
customer_reviews.author: 1dogissky WORLDWIDE

customer_reviews.title: Way too difficult !!!
customer_reviews.text: Why would you play a game where you could only get about 3 or 4 points, floppy bird was bad enough, but this is just ridiculous, there are soo many things you have to look out for, I can't even see how this is a game. It would be more entertaining to pull out all of your hairs one by one, and on the subject of one, this app gets one star, as this is the lowest there is. You're lucky this was free or I would be demanding a refund!!!
customer_reviews.author: George Boswell

customer_reviews.title: EPIC really
customer_reviews.text: It is hard, I will admit that. My high score is only 2 but it is good. If you did not work it out at first (I didn't) the way to play is each time you tap, you start moving towards the other side. I hope this was helpful as it's a great game to play.
customer_reviews.author: 87Oscar87

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to be fun
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened but for some reason the devs of flappy bird have just created the most rage infusing game I have ever had the misfortune to install
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Anderson

customer_reviews.title: WILL MAKE YOU CRY!!
customer_reviews.text: I went on the appstore and was like YAY! A NEW FLAPPYBIRD!! This app ruined my life. Bring back flappybird, i have it on my i pad but not on my kindle fire. This game cost me a chip in my screen and a dent in my wall. Damn you DotGears!! How dare you create this!! Gave this two stars. Its seriously hard. Got 7 on my second go on good old Flappy, have 1 on this and Ive had it for 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: HippieFish11

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: The game design is the same to flappy bird but the gameplay is different. It is iextremely addictive, once you find the right "rhythm" to tap to. It can be annoying when you're really close but it doesn't count it, however overall it is a good game. Although I would only recommend it if you have good control of your anger or if you aren't easily annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamwalker12

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get one!!!
customer_reviews.text: GG Dottgears Flappy Birds Now This swing Copters Creative Names Its A Challenging Game And There Will Be Many copies of this game. THE MOST CHALLENGING GAME EVER SWING COPTERS VS. FLAPPY BIRD BURD WHAT'S THE HARDEST?!?!?
customer_reviews.author: some guy

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult
customer_reviews.text: This game is so difficult that it's actually hard to enjoy. Definitely puts flappy bird to shame for how hard it is. Yet worth it if u wanna try it out ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Swing Copters is a really fun game, it is so much better than flappy bird, the moment you get on the leaderboard you're addicted. Swing copters has immersive gameplay and it gives you a sense of achievement when yo beat your high score. Get this game, it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Thesupergamerguy1001

customer_reviews.title: Five stars *****
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing and addictive game for people who have good patience. Once you know what to do, you just keep playing! I recommend this game to everyone with good patience and skills.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: like flappy Bird like this
customer_reviews.text: The creator of flappy Bird so don't think this is easy because I don't think it ok so ragers don't get the unless you like failing. One thing if you beat eleven good for that's my score ha predisposed ha hahahahahaha (cough x 13) 8===)
customer_reviews.author: Lols reviews

customer_reviews.title: WAY TO HARD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This app is very enjoyable although it is unbelievably hard. (Way too hard!!!) But the good thing of this app is that you have to be pretty good at this game in order to play it.
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: epic
customer_reviews.text: It's hard but how can u not like it he has like a sort of butt and his eyes look like boobs so if ur not likening it u have a problem
customer_reviews.author: E.Lovick

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: It's addictive and its the next flappy bird, so addictive and so fun. Definitely worth looking at if you like Flappy bird
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: It's made by the creators of flappy bird, is like flappy bird but different controls. It is hard but overall is a good game.my hi score is 5 can you beat it?
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: fun and addictive
customer_reviews.text: Fun and very addictive my high score is 19 pretty good if you ask me maybe the new floppy Bird
customer_reviews.author: alfie lawson

customer_reviews.title: Hardness
customer_reviews.text: Swingcopters is a real hard game but great to play. I sit for hours on end play in it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: lol
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game made me almost brake my tablet lol install it it's amazing but you might break everything awesome game
customer_reviews.author: Palmtree

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great game Soooooooooooooo addicting though it's a must have like floppy bird
customer_reviews.author: David Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Jesus it's hard
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun I just got to 3 but at the start I had no idea what 2 do but when I understood how to play I was hooked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flappy birds all over
customer_reviews.text: This game makes flappy birds look easy. Once again it's the concept ,having to move through the gate to get the high score. However now it involves a hard to control helicopter and swinging battle hammers.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Ambler

customer_reviews.title: Good game but very hard.
customer_reviews.text: From the people who brought you Flappy Bird, comes swing copters, the hardest game on the Amazon Appstore. This is a good game but would be better if you could get past 1 stage. Conclusion: Hard game but nothing wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Brown

customer_reviews.title: flappy bird
customer_reviews.text: It's made by the same person that created flappy bird but seriously, I the all they could do? At least flappy bird you could actually have a chance and it was challenging not impossible. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyIsabelle

customer_reviews.title: Swing Copters
customer_reviews.text: Hmmmm...meh. flappy bird was better. It puts flappy bird to shame in terms of difficulty. It isn't as addictive. Worth it, but flappy bird was better.
customer_reviews.author: Hellbat4

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I think this game is ok my high score was 0 and after 2 minutes I rage quit If you are a quieter don't get this game you have to be very patient!
customer_reviews.author: epicgame

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: Never will you be so happy for getting a score of 1. Makes flappy birds look easy in comparison, and is more addictive as a result
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: not AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game can't become the next flappy bird as this one is a piece of crap and it takes 10 tries to get a score of 1... not cool dude, not cool
customer_reviews.author: maximum917
